Links and resources

found on the internet

I’ll just put these here

A list of things that I’ve found on the web and thought, “oooh, that’ll come in handy”, or that perhaps just amused me. Either way, here they are.

  • Dev.to

    https://dev.to/

    An interesting looking and lively technical discussion site

  • Airtable

    https://airtable.com/

    Airtable works like a spreadsheet but gives you the power of a database to organize anything. Sign up for free.

  • Gatsby

    https://www.gatsbyjs.org/

    A static site generator which uses React and provides both pre-rendering and client-side hydration. Some interesting bonuses included such as easy service worker support and GraphQL built in for provising templates with their data.

  • VS Code Insert Date String

    https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=jsynowiec.vscode-insertdatestring

    A handy and configurable VS Code extension to insert formatted date strings.

  • Notist

    https://noti.st/

    A new resource for conference speakers and attendees. Hoping that this will grow to replace the now dusty Lanyrd site which Eventbright appear to have mothballed.
